website_summaries.verdict: A highly interactive FurReal Friend that earns praise for being cute and responsive, and appealing to most kids.
pros: A baby panda friend with more than 45 interactions and responses that include walking, cooing, and drinking sounds
comes with baby bottle and rattle
cons: Reports of it not responding as advertised when the rattle is shaken

customer_reviews.title: Defective... twice!
customer_reviews.text: The toy only works on demo mode. When I switch it on it takes two steps and then stops and after that nothing else works. I have seen other reviewer’s say their panda had this exact same defect. I tried new batteries and all the troubleshooting found in the manual. Nothing helped. Then I ordered a replacement and it has the exact same defect! Comparing this to the furreal snow leopard, which we got for my other daughter and that one works perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Sarah M. Bernier

customer_reviews.title: Cute-but has glitches compared to the gray leopard
customer_reviews.text: Cute, but definitely has glitches compared to the leopard version. You have to press the back multiple times to get the panda to move. I was also disappointed with the packaging--the press sticker was so adhered and embedded into the fur I had to use a wet wash cloth to even remove it. The fur is also loose on the body. The quality was below par compared to the other Hasbro products. I would recommend the gray leopard version if you do not have an animal preference. The cost is less and the features are the same without the glitches.
customer_reviews.author: Momma C

customer_reviews.title: We just had our family Christmas get together. My ...
customer_reviews.text: We just had our family Christmas get together. My 7 year old granddaughter opened this as her gift. The panda only works on demo. When you turn it on it makes two steps and stops. Does nothing else? What do we do? I had a broken hearted little girl!! :-(
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Huffstetler

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift for a friend's child. When she opened it there was a chorus of "Awwww" from all 9 little girls who attended the birthday party. Just from taking a look at it in the package, it makes very cute little baby-ish sounds. Slurps when you pretend to feed it. I did not get to see her play with it, but her mother told me that all the girls in her household were "LOVING" the panda. Her capital letters, not mine.
customer_reviews.author: A mom

customer_reviews.title: Darling and So Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this in the mail for my daughter and I am beyond thrilled!! This little panda is SOOOO CUTE!! I made sure to press on its back and it’s tongue to make sure it works and sure enough it worked just as it is supposed to. I just know my daughter will LOVE this! It’s soooo darling ❤️
customer_reviews.author: BH

customer_reviews.title: Looked Cheap
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in this furreal product (panda bear). I have ordered several furreal products for my grandchildren over the years and this is the first one that I didn't like. It just looked cheap...and it wasn't,it was over $70. I returned it without even showing my granddaughter,who I bought it for.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Welch

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for the kids
customer_reviews.text: My youngest has Go Go already and the elder daughter decided she wanted Pom Pom so they can play together. Well the whole first day they played with both and also included some of their other favorite toys and their minds wandered into all sorts of imaginative worlds to play in. For me, I could not help but think Pom Pom sounds like baby Chinese talk. Not sure if that has anything to do with it being a Panda and Hasbro just went with that idea but I kept laughing when that thing was yapping. I great buy for the kids, especially since the price finally dropped to something closer to reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Schlep

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Great product and great value. This product was able to give me exactly what I wanted out of it. It was able to do this without causing any concern and overall made me happy. I am a happy consumer and will trust this seller from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Toby Bateman

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase.
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived broken with a single leaky battery in the chamber. Ended up contacting Hasbro directly regarding an exchange and they indicated this item is no longer made, was last manufactured in 2014 and the vendor here is selling old units above MSRP. Would not recommend purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Cute and loved by many
customer_reviews.text: My kids and their nieces and nephews were taken with this during Christmas time. This is a cute interactive toy that mimics a baby. It's adjustable, walks, eats, talks, and interactive. If you have kids that love mothering... his is the toy. Now almost 2 months later, she rarely gets played with...but I am finding there are very few toys that get played with 2 months after Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Amy E Williams

customer_reviews.title: Corroded batteries and contacts.
customer_reviews.text: This was for my 6 yo granddaughter that came to visit for a few days before Christmas. We opened the gifts the morning before she left with her estranged brother's. The toys' batteries were corroded and it didn't work, I managed to clean the contacts enough to get it to move and purr but that was about it. The toy looked to be a couple of years old but still in the box..She was happy that i got it to work, but i don't know how long.
customer_reviews.author: edward m.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Love love love my nephew is obsessed with pandas and he was so happy to receive Pom Pom on his birthday. Very happy with the quality it is his second furreal friend
customer_reviews.author: yolanda cruz

customer_reviews.title: Very adorable
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this for my niece, who is 9 years old. She asked Santa for this and although I thought it was a little baby-ish for her, she loves it. I have to admit, while wrapping the Panda, I did try it out and it's very adorable and I couldn't help but smile. The Panda makes these cute purring noises and once in a while says "mama" It's not very cuddly b/c of the mechanics inside, but my niece still does cuddle with it.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Daughter Loves It
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old wanted one and loves it. I can't really say anything more about it.
customer_reviews.author: azjoe_63

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Supper Nice and just like photo show . Very happy with item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Another robot animal that never gets played with.
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old daughter HAD to have this for Christmas. It was her only request, so against my better judgment we bought it for her. As expected, this panda received great excitement when the package was opened, and quickly entered the graveyard of forgotten robot dogs and other mysterious creatures. It was played with about 20 minutes, and 3 months later has not been brought out since.
customer_reviews.author: Lori W.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working 5 minutes out of the box - on Christmas Day!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my daughter. She loved it and wanted to play with it immediately. It worked for about 5 minutes, then stopped responding. I thought the batteries were dead and tried two other sets of brand new batteries before concluding the toy was broken. So disappointed in this toy and in Amazon, because after reading through the reviews, I see this is a common problem. What parent doesn't want to see their child cry on Christmas?
customer_reviews.author: Kelly A Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Adorable panda toy
customer_reviews.text: I accidentally ordered the parent-friendly version of this toy (which threw me when the package arrived), but it truly was parent friendly and that was great. The toy is cute, and since my daughter loves Pandas she is a huge fan of it. The only weird thing is that the toy's "voice" sounds REALLY familiar. Like I'm sure we have another toy somewhere in this house that makes a similar sound. It's kind of driving me crazy.
customer_reviews.author: R. Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Christmas joy
customer_reviews.text: I hope she likes it. Christmas presen for my niece very soft I love the rattle and bottle. Will have to post another review after she opens it.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey B.

customer_reviews.title: fast shipping, cute toy, doesnt do much though
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and soft, my 2 yr old was amazed at first, but got bored within 15 minutes, as it just walks, poorly at that. Overall, not bad, but could be cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: shaylynn

customer_reviews.title: My nieces (5 and 7) love these FurReal friends
customer_reviews.text: My nieces (5 and 7) love these FurReal friends. Their mom says they take them everywhere and at night put them to bed. My girls don't have a lot of patience for most toys so I gotta think they these are worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi of Oregon

customer_reviews.title: While there is a solid badly the outside fur is super cuddly. I originally ordered from Amazon and was ...
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old loves this panda. While there is a solid badly the outside fur is super cuddly. I originally ordered from Amazon and was disappointed it came in an unmarked box which did not make nice presentation for gift. We returned to Amazon and bought from SAMs club. It is very interactive by voice and touch. The pourable head and legs are a big plus. This is her favorite Christmas present
customer_reviews.author: new mother

customer_reviews.title: GREAT gift, cute toy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift for our oldest daughter who is 6. She loves it, it makes cute sounds and walks around. It is kind of hard to get the panda to follow the rattle but it does work sometimes. The bottle is cute and the Panda does feed from it. Overall a great gift
customer_reviews.author: Jen's House

customer_reviews.title: I hate these things
customer_reviews.text: I hate these things. The play factor is low with them, but kids love them for about 1 day then they get bored. I keep trying to talk her out of wanting them and eventually she'll understand.
customer_reviews.author: Murphy the Dog

customer_reviews.title: A WINNER
customer_reviews.text: I gave this 5 stars because I cant give more, got this for My Grand Daughter and I hit a homerun with it for a week that they came to visit she would not stop playing it, it, like a pet and baby all in one
customer_reviews.author: willie

customer_reviews.title: it does not move like advertised. Disappointing for the price paid
customer_reviews.text: The product did not match up with the description. The description said the pet would have over 70 responses, yet it only appears to have 5. The panda's head falls down and does not stay up. It pauses, and you can hear the mechanism running with no response from the animal. When the pet's back is petted, it does not move like advertised. Disappointing for the price paid.
customer_reviews.author: Sta

customer_reviews.title: Cute panda
customer_reviews.text: Is a Christmas present for my daughter' not sure how it will do yet but I'm sure she's going to love it. Looks so cute and cuddly. I can't wait to see her face when she opens her gift.
customer_reviews.author: Jeraldine

customer_reviews.title: Great panda, not great packing
customer_reviews.text: This panda is adorable. My daughter loves it! I have nothing bad to say about this item, but the only thing I don't understand is why it was sent without its original box. When I opened the packaging box, the panda and it's accessories were in a plastic bag. It would've been nice to have the original packaging when she unwrapped it for Christmas. Or it could've been put in the description that original packaging is not included. Other than that, great toy panda.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Anne

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, and nicely packaged. Adorable looking, and she sweetly cooed when you pressed the try me button on her back. Can't wait for my daughter to open her up on Christmas! Will update my review after getting her out of the box. I have high expectations, so hopefully it will deliver.
customer_reviews.author: maria

customer_reviews.title: Adorable stuffed pet with motion controls
customer_reviews.text: Cute little Panda Bear that responds to my granddaughters motion commands. It's also cuddly enough to use as a stuffed animal friend without the unit turned on...
customer_reviews.author: Mutz

customer_reviews.title: make some of the cutest noises it's just so expensive I would love to get more for my grandkids but they are ...
customer_reviews.text: This little panda bear is so cute and cuddly, make some of the cutest noises it's just so expensive I would love to get more for my grandkids but they are so pricey
customer_reviews.author: DBT

customer_reviews.title: She loves it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 5 year old and she loves it. I as an adult don't see the appeal of course, it doesn't do a whole lot, but she is totally head over heels for the thing. It is very soft fur, which is a bonus from some of those other FurReal toys we have had with rougher fur. I highly recommend this for your little ones!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Mailey

customer_reviews.title: 2nd times a charm -
customer_reviews.text: Well, 3 stars because the first one we received (as a Christmas present) was dirty and not in a box - in a bag. Frankly, looked used or was a display. We returned it after the holiday through Amazon and that was easy to do and the replacement was much better. My daughter loves it. If it wasn't for the fact that the first one looked like it was from the floor of a taxi cab it would have had at least a 4 star review.
customer_reviews.author: Zabadu

customer_reviews.title: Happy toodler
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift for my niece last year. Battery is easy to replace. Still works up to this review. She was quite happy with the toy.
customer_reviews.author: MDC

customer_reviews.title: Small but cute.
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and cuddly but much smaller then we had expected. Other FurReal friends were selling for similar prices and much larger. If we had known the difference, we would have purchased the larger pets for the same price. Overall it is very cute and cuddly. The best thing about this is that it only takes Double AA batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Fuchango

customer_reviews.title: I love watching my kids play and feed her
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest little panda I have ever seen. I love watching my kids play and feed her..they love how she walks like a real animal.
customer_reviews.author: krystle rich

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: Well, she really enjoyed it. Hearing the same sounds over and over again made me slowly slip into insanity but I guess what child's toy that makes noise doesn't do that?
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: My 7 yr old granddaughter says it's the cutest thing she's ever seen
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my niece and she loved it. I was really impressed with how much variety this fur friend offers. It's been a while since I felt it but I think it was super soft. I researched a lot of the furreal friends and decided on this one. They're pricey friends but cheaper than pets :)
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves pom pom, mommy thinks she is ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves pom pom, mommy thinks she is cute too. The more my daughter plays with pom pom the more she does, like it now tells my daughter I love you. Pom pom little panda talk is really cute, not annoying like other toys (furby disappeared quickly)
customer_reviews.author: mm2000

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Of course this being one of the hottest toys of 2014 my daughter absolutely loved this. It didn't come in typical packaging you would buy from the store. It was just in a plastic bag inside of an ordinary box. But the cuteness and the interaction between the panda and my daughter is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Daughter LOVES it!
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old daughter LOVES this toy. I have to admit it's pretty cute and the little girl in me wishes I'd had one as a child. The adult in my will admit it can be a bit annoying, but it's worth it to see my daughter with it. I will also say I like it better because I got it on sale.
customer_reviews.author: J. Denning

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: Santa brought this to my 4yr old. She really wanted it after seeing the commercial... but she hardly plays with it. She loves animals and baby dolls, but this toy is just collecting dust in her playroom.
customer_reviews.author: FloridaMom

customer_reviews.title: Great interactive toy
customer_reviews.text: What a great diversion for active little kids being in lockdown! Thank you,
customer_reviews.author: lai thi do

customer_reviews.title: Adorable. Toddler loves.
customer_reviews.text: Our toddler loves this panda. She loves feeding her, and talking to her. Her grandmother is called "MOMO" and this panda sounds like it says "momo" often, so of course she loves panda even more for knowing her momo.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice!
customer_reviews.text: This was a wonderful gift for my daughter, she loves it, runs great!
customer_reviews.author: LoveG

customer_reviews.title: My daughter bought this with her birthday money. It ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter bought this with her birthday money. It comes when you shake the rattle, it makes 'feeding' noises when she inserts the bottle or her finger into its mouth. It makes 'snuggling' noises when she picks it up.
customer_reviews.author: StephL

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute Panda
customer_reviews.text: My 4 (almost 5) year old got this for Christmas and loves it. Has played with it more than most everything else she got for Christmas. It really is adorable the way it moves, and drinks her bottle. My daughter's favorite is when she gets the hiccups.
customer_reviews.author: BaseballGal

customer_reviews.title: Christmas present
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas present for my great granddaughter and she loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie1221

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Box was destroyed. The toy seems ok. But battery needs to be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: ChelleBelle

customer_reviews.title: I felt a little sorry for Christmas Barbie...Not.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my niece for Christmas and trust me she thought out of all her many, many, many Christmas gifts that this was the best one she had received. She held onto it all day and night. I felt a little sorry for Christmas Barbie...Not.
customer_reviews.author: Scottish

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought as gift for grandbaby as she loves being a "mommy" to her dolls and pets
customer_reviews.author: JCOhio

customer_reviews.title: A big hit
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 4 year old daughter for Christmas and she absolutely LOVES this toy. It's pretty interactive and super cute. Shipping was amazing. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mia Gustafson

customer_reviews.title: Decent toy
customer_reviews.text: Not as much movement as I thought it would have. Head must be manually moved although it looks like it should go as part of the animatronics. The sounds are cute. Still, the 5 year old is happy.
customer_reviews.author: Dewey

customer_reviews.title: Adorable toy!
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest thing! I got it for my 2 year old, but we all love it. When my older daughter's friends come over, they all play with it too.
customer_reviews.author: 325sarah

customer_reviews.title: Adorable. Very sweet sounds
customer_reviews.text: Adorable. Very sweet sounds, cute soft panda with a more solid inner structure. Frustration free packaging is a small, simple cardboard box. Great idea. Less in landfills, quick way for an excited child to play with the toy.
customer_reviews.author: kmack

customer_reviews.title: so I'm sure my niece will love it!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute! Delivered on time. Christmas present, so I'm sure my niece will love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must buy for any panda lover
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves pandas so this was the perfect gift for her. It did not come in the original box which I thought was really weird but it works perfectly so I didn't complain. She hasn't let Pom Pom out of her site since Christmas Eve. We love it when she says "Mama, I wuv u" So cute!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Allen

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughter loves it, so it has to be ...
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves it, so it has to be a 5 star rating... You would have thought she won the lottery when she opened it... :)
customer_reviews.author: ZDC_Shriner

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: This is very adorable ! My granddaughter loves pandas and this is a birthday gift. I know she is going to love this! I wanted to keep for myself it's so cute!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Lugo

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves this toy. Note that it defaults ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this toy. Note that it defaults to the frustration free packaging and comes simple and in a box (this may not be ideal for gift giving to others - you'll need to switch the default back to standard packaging).
customer_reviews.author: Elmhurst Mom

customer_reviews.title: would have been nice to know that in advance
customer_reviews.text: This product did not come in the manufacturer's Packaging, although it did have all parts and instructions. But for the discount in price I guess I'm ok with it, would have been nice to know that in advance.
customer_reviews.author: kimkimble

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't do as much as I hoped and the cooing can get extremely repetitive and annoying.
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars only because my daughter loves this toy but I'm personally under whelmed. Doesn't do as much as I hoped and the cooing can get extremely repetitive and annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my cousins daughter and she loved it! She loves playing with it. The only thing is them at we have to keep buying batteries for it but it's a small price to pay for how fun it is.
customer_reviews.author: Janette

customer_reviews.title: They are like her pets that she can take care of
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old Granddaughter loves it! She couldn't wait to play & feed her. she also got Butterscotch the pony for Christmas & uses the little brush she got from her & grooms them both. She plays with them daily. They are like her pets that she can take care of. Her 3 year old brother likes them as well.
customer_reviews.author: Humbug

customer_reviews.title: LOVE This Panda!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a cute toy. My daughter of course placed it on her Christmas list first thing as she has quite a menagerie of robo-creatures already. I was skeptical & groaned of course because of this! Once it arrived, Husband & I opened it to check it out & found that it's actually super cute/sweet & much different from previous robo-creatures my daughter has acquired from the same company in years past. The panda seems sturdy & does some seriously sweet little things that will provide a good play opportunity for children to interact & care for. This isn't just another kitty cat or puppy dog robot, it's super sweet & sure to be a hit with your kids!
customer_reviews.author: Vulnadia

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed.
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter picked this out of a Target ad as something she wanted for Christmas, so I ordered it. However, when I received it, I was not very impressed. The sounds it makes are very irritating and I don't think she would play with it very much. I'm returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Violet

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a great price
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this panda. She takes it everywhere. Great product for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: krystal

customer_reviews.title: A PANDA LOVERS' DREAM!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter is 10 years old, and is all about pandas. This was such an awesome gift, it brought her to tears. The interaction is great, it does many different things. The fur is extremely soft.
customer_reviews.author: K Scarbeck

customer_reviews.title: Girls love ths toy
customer_reviews.text: My niece got this for Christmas and she loves the panda baby
customer_reviews.author: Itzayana Garfias

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't really seem to follow the rattle like the advertisements show
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't really seem to follow the rattle like the advertisements show, so it seems a bit pricey for just a battery powered toy. Cute toy though and my 4-year-old daughter enjoys it.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Fur Real Fun
customer_reviews.text: Santa brought this for my daughter. The toy lives up to expectations, but it was shipped in a plain brown box rather than the FurReal Friends packaging, so that was a little disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Need an original box.
customer_reviews.text: This toy is beautiful,but It is not packed in the original box.If you are going to give it as gift looks very ugly.It was in a bag and you can think is used.
customer_reviews.author: tolondrin

customer_reviews.title: my granddaughter loves it - her and I played with ...
customer_reviews.text: my granddaughter loves it - her and I played with it for hours after she opened it for her birthday present - really cute and does what it says - will be ordering the walking dog for next present !!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie N.

customer_reviews.title: Lovable
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful panda. Very appealing. Sweet sounds and actions. My 5 year old loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Pittsburgh Lady

customer_reviews.title: A fun toy for the kids to enjoy.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this panda as a birthday present. It was a hit among the 4-5 year olds. They really like how it responds to their "touch" and that it kinda walks like a baby panda.
customer_reviews.author: marchloe

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Sounds like a baby cooing & gurgling. Walks really well. My grand daughter was ecstatic with the Xmas present. The only but is, its hard and not cuddly .
customer_reviews.author: June Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Bad
customer_reviews.text: The batteries came in rusted and fried and the toy stopped working after a day or two.
customer_reviews.author: Janet S

customer_reviews.title: It was good and cute
customer_reviews.text: It was good and cute, my daughter loves it. But it is not so resistant to little kids; in example, my daughter hugs it and hugs frequently and not the neck does not move.
customer_reviews.author: Good Christian Book

customer_reviews.title: ... my daughter I have to make it look so cool: /
customer_reviews.text: The toy is 100% new but as the reviews and photos say it doesnt come with the original box so for a xmas present for my daughter I have to make it look so cool :/.
customer_reviews.author: Giselle Cast

customer_reviews.title: Great gift! Ordered two of these
customer_reviews.text: Great gift! Ordered two of these, one for an adult friend who really loves pandas and one for a four year old. It's fun for everyone, great quality, soft feel and realistic movements and sound. How cute!
customer_reviews.author: linden

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: My 16 mo old daughter loves this toy! One issue over time the panda head no longer stays in place.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a winner!
customer_reviews.text: My girls love it. When I read that it "interacts" with the puppy I expected a bit more, but still, the girls really adore it so there ya go!
customer_reviews.author: Jill Tomscha

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: CUTE AND MY DAUGHTER LOVES IT, BUT TOTALLY OVER PRICED
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Adorbs.
customer_reviews.text: This panda is so soft and so cute and my girls adore it. They carry it around all over the place and its fur has held up very well.
customer_reviews.author: chellefutch

customer_reviews.title: So glad I purchased it and got it for a great
customer_reviews.text: My Grand daughter loves it. So glad I purchased it and got it for a great price
customer_reviews.author: eeb

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my niece and she absolutely love it! It talks and coos
customer_reviews.text: So cute! I bought this for my niece and she absolutely love it! It talks and coos, crawls and "talks back" to my niece when she talks to it.
customer_reviews.author: K. Humble

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter was really happy with her present for Christmas
customer_reviews.author: Waldini

customer_reviews.title: Cute toy!
customer_reviews.text: This little toy is adorable and my niece loves it. It works really well
customer_reviews.author: HShopper

customer_reviews.title: Best Gift Ever for an 8 year old
customer_reviews.text: Hands Down...best Christmas Gift Ever. Worked perfectly, arrived on time. No issues after months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer A. Mcdonough

customer_reviews.title: The kitty cat version of this is better.
customer_reviews.text: Not as articulated of action as I hoped. The kitty cat version of this is better.
customer_reviews.author: Sparklene

customer_reviews.title: Cute but little more than a stuffed animal
customer_reviews.text: It's cute, but not quite as wonderful as it advertises.
customer_reviews.author: RJ Samm

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: Really cute but I think mine may be defective. It sometimes talks slow and moves slow randomly. Even after we replaced the batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Still wonderful after every day use
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this town. We've had it for 6 months. Still wonderful after every day use.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk Weed

customer_reviews.title: It was the perfect gift. My 7 year old grandson kept telling ...
customer_reviews.text: It was the perfect gift. My 7 year old grandson kept telling me he wanted this for Christmas but no one else believed him. As soon as he opened the box he was thrilled. This is a little boy that is all about everything "boy" so I was delighted when he loved the FurReal Panda.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy Berens

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: 6 year old loves it! sleeps with it every night
customer_reviews.author: Paula Renee

customer_reviews.title: Great even for 18 month olds!
customer_reviews.text: My neice is obsessed with this! She calls it baby and cradles it! I got it during the cyber Monday special so I am definitely satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: worth the money to make a child happy.
customer_reviews.text: i really don't understand the appeal of this thing, but my niece absolutely LOVES it. worth the money to make a child happy.
customer_reviews.author: Yvan

customer_reviews.title: I know she will LOVE
customer_reviews.text: It walks and makes cute panda sounds. This is a Christmas gift for my Granddaughter so she hasn't opened it yet however, I know she will LOVE it
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: Very Cute!
customer_reviews.text: My baby girl was happy that Santa got her this, I almost told her the truth but she was to happy. Maybe next year.
customer_reviews.author: LadyQuay
